info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 3:55PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of Deer Lodge, southeastern Granite, Silver Bow and southeastern Powell Counties through 445 PM MST... At 354 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported intense snow showers along a line extending from 9 miles south of Montana City to 9 miles northwest of Divide. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Very low visibility of less than one quarter mile and heavy snow. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel through this region. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Butte, Anaconda, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Warm Springs, Galen, Gregson Hot Springs, Divide, West Valley, Nissler, Crackerville, Fishtrap, Racetrack, Lost Creek, Opportunity, Ramsay, Janney, Newcomb and Georgetown. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 184 and 230. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
